name: Pulsar (GL1TCH3D)
description:
Overview:

Immerse yourself in the endless space that is Pulsar and show your strength against the relentless waves of enemy  ships that seek to destroy you in this 2D space shooter. 

Features:

  • Multiple weapons
  • Wave Defense
  • Interactive terrain

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Up, Left, Down, Right
  • Mouse - Look control
  • Left Click - Primary weapon
  • Right Click - Secondary weapon
  • Escape - Pause

System Requirements:

  • Operating System: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 8 compatible Graphics Card
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB Hard Drive space

Credits:

Unknown source - gunshot sound taken from youtube compilation

Contact:
